mapper.select:
select
,(select s.shop_name from shop s where po.shop_id=s.shop_id) shop_name, ifnull((select sum(poss.production_Quantity) from produce_order_shop_sku poss where poss.produce_order_id=po.id),0) productionQuantityTotal, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT shop_parent_sku) shopParentSkus FROM `produce_order_shop_sku` poss,`shop_sku` ss WHERE poss.produce_order_id=po.id AND poss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id AND shop_parent_sku IS NOT NULL AND shop_parent_sku!='') shopParentSkus
from produce_order po
and shop_id =#{shopId} and production_time>= #{productionTimeStart} and production_time <= #{productionTimeEnd} and batch_number like concat('%',#{batchNumber},'%')
and exists (select 1 from produce_order_shop_sku poss,shop_sku ss where poss.produce_order_id=po.id and poss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from produce_order_shop_sku poss,shop_sku ss,sku s where poss.produce_order_id=po.id and poss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.sku_id=s.sku_id and s.sku like concat('%',#{sku},'%'))
and po.status=#{status} and po.type=#{type} and po.completion_time>=#{monthDate} and po.completion_time < date_add(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH)
order by po.batch_number desc

select
from produce_order po where po.completion_time>=#{monthDate} and po.completion_time < date_add(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH) and po.status=3 and po.cost_status=0 and(po.fabric_cost is null or auxiliary_material_cost is null) order by po.batch_number desc

select sku.sku from produce_order po,produce_order_shop_sku poss,shop_sku ss,sku where po.id=poss.produce_order_id and poss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.sku_id=sku.sku_id and po.completion_time>=#{monthDate} and po.completion_time < date_add(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH) and po.status=3 and po.cost_status=0 and (sku.cost_price is null or sku.cost_price>=999) group by sku.sku

select p.product_code from produce_order po,produce_order_shop_sku poss,shop_sku ss,sku,product p where po.id=poss.produce_order_id and poss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.sku_id=sku.sku_id and sku.product_id=p.product_id and po.completion_time>=#{monthDate} and po.completion_time < date_add(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH) and po.status=3 and po.cost_status=0 and p.labour_cost is null group by p.product_code
